Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lexington/Leamington
ShortDescription: SB 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Lexington, enter I-290, & exit at Cicero, due to street blockage near Lexington/Leamington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Lexington, enter I-290, & exit at Cicero, due to street blockage near Lexington/Leamington.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
